name: Strand Electoral Management Services
overview: Strand Electoral Management Services Limited develops and delivers Windows-based electoral management software systems for local authorities in the United Kingdom. Its products include STRAND Electoral Registration System, an electoral registration software solution; STRAND Election Management System, an election management software solution; and SERVO Results Presentation System, a solution for managing and displaying election results. The company was formerly known as Computershare Electoral Management Services Ltd. and changed its name to Strand Electoral Management Services Limited in July 2010. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Woodford Green, the United Kingdom. As of July 29, 2010, Strand Electoral Management Services Limited operates as a subsidiary of IDOX plc.

acquisition.source_description: IDOX acquires Computershare Electoral Management Services
